authSignIn.signInWithEmailLinkPlaceHolder: Press Go to sign-in with an email link.

superAdminPopover.title: How to sign in as Super Admin
superAdminPopover.emailLine: Enter your Stanford email or the admin email assigned to your ROAR account.
superAdminPopover.chooseOptions: Then choose one of the following options:
superAdminPopover.passwordOption: Sign-in using password: type your password to access your dashboard.
superAdminPopover.emailLinkOption: Sign-in using email link: receive a one-time secure link in your inbox.
superAdminPopover.googleLine: You can also Sign in with Google if your account is linked to a Google email.
superAdminPopover.notice: üîí Only authorized Super Admins can access this portal. If you cannot sign in, contact the ROAR support team for verification or access recovery.

signInPopover.title: Follow these steps to sign in

educatorsSteps.passwordOption: Sign in using password: type your password to log in.
educatorsSteps.emailLinkOption: Sign in using email link: receive a sign-in link in your inbox.

homeParticipant.contactAdministrator: Please contact your administrator to get added to an assignment.

homeSelector.inactivityLogout:
You will soon be logged out for security purposes. Please click "Continue" if you wish to continue your session.
 Otherwise, you will be automatically logged out in { timeLeft } seconds.

gameTabs.heartsAndFlowersDescription: Choose the correct side for the hearts and flowers.
gameTabs.matrixReasoningDescription: Find the missing piece to complete the puzzle.
gameTabs.memoryGameDescription: Watch the squares light up. Remember the order and make the same pattern.
gameTabs.sameDifferentSelectionDescription: Find things that are the same about the shapes.
gameTabs.theoryOfMindDescription: Listen to the stories and answer the questions.
gameTabs.trogDescription: Listen to the words and choose the matching picture.
gameTabs.surveyDescription: Answer questions about your time at school.
gameTabs.vocabDescription: Listen to the word and choose the matching image.
gameTabs.roarInferenceDescription: Read the stories and answer the questions.

notFound.label: Return to Home.
notFound.sorry: Sorry, we could not find that page!

pageSignIn.login: Log in to ROAR to start roaring
